name: Chicken Parm Soup

ingredients.name: Vegetable Broth
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 1 pkg (900 mL/30 oz) low sodium vegetable broth

ingredients.name: Roasted Garlic & Parmesan Hot Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Dice zucchinis and set aside.
  2. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken to pan and lightly brown, 2—3 min.  
  3. Add diced zucchini to pan and cook until slightly softened, about 2—3 min. 
  4. Add broth, dip mix, crushed tomatoes, and water. Cover and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.  
  5. When soup is boiling, stir constantly while adding cheese a little bit at a time, until cheese is melted. Add topper, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve over 1⁄2 cup cooked, bite-sized pasta, like rotini or penne.
